data.name: Timbal
data.description: Friendly orange cat with heart shaped fur stain. If you see him pick him, you will be able to handle him

data.name: Te
data.description: Turtle female cat, very shy. You can try to pick her as she is very tamed

data.name: Lolo
data.description: Demon male cat. Don't try to touch him or pick him. He will probably bite and scratch you. Just call, we love him anyway!.
